mapper.select: select id, name from agent where id in ( select id from agent where super_id=#{id} union select id from agent where super_id in (select id from agent where super_id=#{id}) union select id from agent where super_id in (select id from agent where super_id in (select id from agent where super_id=#{id})) ) order by rank
mapper.update: update acct set available_balance=available_balance-#{availableBalance} where id=#{id} and available_balance>=#{availableBalance}
